header: BRIEF-Dun & Bradstreet to team up with Microsoft for its cloud business
body: * Dun & Bradstreet says is teaming up with Microsoft to give companies direct access to its data through Microsoft’s cloud services​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

header: BRIEF-Dun & Bradstreet: Relationship with Microsoft won't impact 2017 results
body: * Dun & Bradstreet Corp says strategic relationship with Microsoft is not expected to impact co’s 2017 financial results - SEC filing Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
